SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM POST P LEFT OUTER JOIN(SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_NICKNAME, INTRODUCE FROM USERS WHERE OUT_DATE IS NULL) U ON P.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND P.DEL = 1 AND P.VISIBILITY = 0
AND P.CATEGORY_NO = 1 AND (P.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%' OR P.EXPLAIN LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%')
AND P.CATEGORY_NO = 2 AND (P.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%' OR P.EXPLAIN LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%')
AND P.CATEGORY_NO = 3 AND (P.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%' OR P.EXPLAIN LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%')
AND U.NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'

SELECT P1.*, DECODE(L.LIKE_CNT, NULL, 0, L.LIKE_CNT) AS LIKE_CNT FROM (SELECT * FROM POST P WHERE DEL = 1 AND P.VISIBILITY = 0) P1 LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT POST_NO, COUNT(*) LIKE_CNT FROM POST_LIKE GROUP BY POST_NO) L ON P1.POST_NO = L.POST_NO WHERE 1 = 1
AND P1.CATEGORY_NO = 1 AND (P1.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%' OR P1.EXPLAIN LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%')
AND P1.CATEGORY_NO = 2 AND (P1.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%' OR P1.EXPLAIN LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%')
AND P1.CATEGORY_NO = 3 AND (P1.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%' OR P1.EXPLAIN LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%')
ORDER BY LIKE_CNT DESC
ORDER BY P1.VIEWS DESC
ORDER BY P1.REGISTER_DATE DESC

SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_NICKNAME, INTRODUCE, PROFILE_IMG_PATH FROM USERS WHERE 1 = 1
AND USER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
AND OUT_DATE IS NULL

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERS WHERE 1 = 1
AND NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
AND OUT_DATE IS NULL
